name: Resource not found
description:
As an API consumer
I want to be informed when I request non-existing resources
So I can learn the API and fix my errors quickly

elements.name: I should get an error when I request non-existing resources

steps.name: I request a non-existing API resource

result.error_message:
Error: Invalid URI "https:///currency/v1/blah"

steps.name: I should get a 400 error with "Invalid date" message and code "400.01.001"

name: Get Currency Rates Feature
description:
As an API user
I want to get currency rates for a base currency
So I can do accurate currency exchange

elements.name: Default base currency should be EUR and default date should be "latest"

steps.name: I request all exchange rates with default values
